1.Title: Warm-Up Exercises
1.Description: When <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color> hits an enemy, Anton gains additional Energy, up to a maximum of 5 Energy per skill use.
1.Lore:
"Are you awake? Get spinning, bro!"
"Try and keep up. It's time to do our stretches!"

2.Title: State of Flow
2.Description: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> and enters <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, he gains a Shield that equals to 7.5% of his Max HP. While in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, entering combat or switching in reapplies the Shield effect. This effect can trigger once every 15s. The Shield dissipates when <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color> ends.
2.Lore:
After arduous training, a few lucky individuals will display exceptional vigor and perform above their usual level during high-intensity activities, entering a state of flow commonly known as "being in the zone."
Are you ready to get moving and enter the zone?
â€” Nitro-Fuel's exclusive program "Good Morning, Zealous Office Workers!"

3.Title: Rotational Training
3.Lore: Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but in a complex and ever-changing Hollow worksite, having a wide skillset can present an opportunity to overcome difficulties.

4.Title: Everyone Get Fired Up!
4.Description: When Anton uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, all squad members' CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 12s.
4.Lore:
"Find your rhythm, and let's get moving!"
When Anton starts to get serious, everyone becomes more nimble.
They have to keep up or else they will be training alone the next day.

5.Title: Jack of All Trades
5.Lore: Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but if you are resolute enough to change from "knowing a bit" to "being excellent," then you become omnipotent!

6.Title: Break the Limit
6.Description: When Anton's <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color> triggers a critical hit, his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode)</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode)</color> deal 4% more DMG for 30s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
6.Lore:
"Yeah bro, can you feel the burn?"
Whenever Anton wants to exceed his limits,
his "bro" starts spinning at an astonishing pace, its buzzing echoing Anton's resolution.

DescriptionByLevel.1: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>12%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.2: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>14%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>23.3%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.3: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>16%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>26.6%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.4: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>18%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>30%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.5: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>33.3%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.6: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>22%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>36.6%</color>.
DescriptionByLevel.7: When Anton uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>24%</color> and when he uses his <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, the skill's DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>40%</color>.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Teamwork
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
While Anton is in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, for every 4 critical hits, the next attack hitting <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color> enemies triggers an additional bout of <color=#2EB6FF>Shock</color> DMG at 45% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

111100001.Title: Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills
111100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 4 mixed attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
The 4th hit is a <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>.

111100002.Title: Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode)
111100002.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> while Anton is in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color> to activate:
Unleashes up to 3 mixed attacks in front, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
During the 2nd <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color> and 3rd <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, press repeatedly or hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to extend the skill duration.

111100003.Title: Special Attack: Spin, Bro!
111100003.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleashes a <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color> against enemies in a line in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

111100004.Title: EX Special Attack: Smash the Horizon, Bro!
111100004.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Launches several <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attacks</color> at enemies in a line in front of him, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Anton enters <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color> after using this skill. When in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, Anton's attacks become more powerful, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> while continually consuming Energy upon hitting an enemy. Burst Mode remains active until his Energy is depleted.

111100005.Title: Special Attack: Explosive Drill (Burst Mode)
111100005.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> while in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color> to activate:
Launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color> at enemies in front, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

111110023.Title: EX Special Attack: Smash the Horizon, Bro!

111100006.Title: Dodge: Let's Move
111100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

111100007.Title: Dash Attack: Fire With Fire
111100007.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Rams into enemies in front of him, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

111100008.Title: Dodge Counter: Retaliation
111100008.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Continuously strikes enemies in front with heavy punches, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

111100009.Title: Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode)
111100009.Description:
While in <color=#FFFFFF>Burst Mode</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color> at enemies in front of him, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

111100010.Title: Chain Attack: Go Go Go!
111100010.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color> onto the ground in front of him over a large area, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> to enemies within range.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

111100011.Title: Ultimate: Go Go Go Go Go!
111100011.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes a <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color> onto the ground in front of him over a large area, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> to enemies within range.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

111110039.Title: Ultimate: Go Go Go Go Go!

111100013.Title: Quick Assist: Shoulder-To-Shoulder
111100013.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Continuously strikes enemies in front of him with heavy punches, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

111100014.Title: Quick Assist: Protective Drill (Burst Mode)
111100014.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Attacks enemies in front with a <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color>, dealing massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

111100015.Title: Defensive Assist: Iron Wrist
111100015.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

111100016.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Limit Burst
111100016.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Launches a <color=#FFFFFF>Drill Attack</color> that ends in a <color=#FFFFFF>Piledriver Attack</color>, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
